name: fastidious
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
giving too much attention to small details and wanting everything to be correct and perfect: fastidious about He is very fastidious about how a suitcase should be packed.
having a strong dislike of anything dirty or unpleasant: They were too fastidious to eat in a fast-food restaurant.
